net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics.ShaderProgram

  • public class ShaderProgram
extends Object
    This class manages the shader files and all the uniforms. This is the interface between java and GLSL
